historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 24-101.

Effective Dates

Pub.L. 105-274, § 10, Oct. 21, 1998, 112 Stat. 2429, provides:

"SEC. 10. EFFECTIVE DATE.

"Except as otherwise specifically provided, this Act and the amendments made by this Act shall take effect as if included in the enactment of title XI of the Balanced Budget Act of 1997."

DC CODE § 24-301

Current through December 11, 2012

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.
